item.title: 100 days, 100 english sentences
item.description: day1 2021年1月16日 星期六 1 There is considerable debate over how we should react if we detect a signal from an alien civilisation. 翻译： 如果我们探测到了来自外星文明的信号，我们应该如何回应是一个备受争议的

item.title: 45 English sentence pattern
item.description: 询问 who can who can help me move this box? who is who is that girl in blue? when can we when can we go hiking? When did you when did you come back? where is where is the washroom? where can I where can i find some bottled water? why do/did why did you quit your job? how did you How did you get to know each other?
